name: Protocol: Panic
description:
Play as the anti-virus software "Howard (Free Trial Version)", who is tasked with stopping the virus from corrupting the computer!

Kill bugs to halt the spread of the virus and collect items, while you climb through the system! Reach elevators at the top of each floor to ascend to the top and reboot the system!

Controls:

A/D - Move left/right

W/Space - Jump/Double Jump

S - Pickup item

Left Click - Use attack item

Left Shift - Use movement item

E - Use offensive item

Made by Calico for Mini Jam 128 

(Sorry that it's very rough around the edges)
